alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:11AM EDT until July 25 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1210 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Middlefield to Burton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Andover, Mecca, Johnston, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores and Cherry Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
